jirleech wrote:

>
> How does heritrix handle sites with a meta refresh tag.  Will it
> follow the link or not?
>
> thanks
>
Heritrix will follow refresh links (See 
http://crawler.archive.org/xref/org/archive/crawler/extractor/ExtractorHTML.html#531).

St.Ack
